calculator.title: Increase credit card limit
calculator.detail: Increase your credit limit up to {maxLimit} fully online, without visiting a branch.

slider.minIncreaseInfo: You must increase the limit by at least CZK 2,000.

calculator.info:
You will keep your physical credit card.
Only your credit limit will be increased.
